post.body: maybe e went outside your house and cut your cable wires.
MY XBL GAMERSCORE IS CURRENTLY 3333
playin call of duty world at war, which i jst bought btw
but not be4 grabbing a snack
im thinkin ill go to bed and listen to the sound rain through the open windows, that outa put me out quick
good episode, now is it time 4 bed or time for eating, csi again and then bed, hmmm
about to watch another episode of CSI NY on Netflix on my xbox 360
(4am) yawnnnnnnnnn time 4 bed
time 4 some left 4 dead then at 9:30ish ill lisitng to the Major Nelson Podcast
yawnnnnnnnnnnnn, 4:05 am, time 4 bed and gotta stop playing Left 4 Dead
omg that was a bad fight
getting ready to watch the oscar day la hoya vs manny pacquiao Pay per view match
time 4 some left 4 dead
time 4 work
(3:09am) gnite
xbl is bein laggier than all shit
(2:40AM) TIME 4 bed
time to go back to Left 4 Dead while i eat my raviolies and meatballs
happy december
OMG i just remember i also have to copy 20+ gigs of music as well, grrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr
copying about 50 Gigs of data to external hard drive so i can format and redo my laptop on Sunday, fun fun fun (not)
just bought a 120Gb Zune from amazon.com for $228
watching 1 more episode of CSI NY on netflix on Xbox live and then it off 2 bed, i think
GTA 4 NAMED GAME OF THE YEAR!!!!!!!!!!!!!
slept til 3:30 pm and then played GTA IV for several hours and now i'm getting ready to watch the VGA's
(7:10am)wow, i pulled an xbox 360 all nighter, now its time to sleep til 3pm
holy crap like 60% of my 65 xbox live friends are all online
patriots win 13-0, now all i need is a ravens loss or a dolphins loss
just got my 120gb zune by UPS
watching csi ny on netflix on xbox live
(430am) time 4 bed
